comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: This photograph was taken on Wednesday 5 February, 1930. It was used to illustrate this article on page 18 of the Sydney Morning Herald the next day: FAMOUS MOTORISTS RETURN TO SYDNEY. Mr. Norman Smith (left) and Mr. D. J. Harkness, on board the Maunganui yesterday. They are holding a floral model of the car in which they broke the world's I 0-mile record in New Zealand. [ ref. nla.gov.au/nla.news-article16623420 ]
